oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard of Fort Oglethorpe
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color postcard, "A Scene at Fort Oglethorpe, Chattanooga, Tenn." depicts mounted cavalry troops standing at attention on the parade grounds. Wooden buildings are set in the background. The card is addressed to Miss Nell Henley/Chattanooga/Tenn./ 106 Oak Street. The writer tells Miss Henley that he is "on my way home. Quite a surprise to me�." The message is signed only "H." The card bears a green 1-cent George Washington postage stamp, cancelled in Chattanooga.
